text: Mario Kägi (born 24 February 1967) is a retired Swiss football midfielder.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:BSC Old Boys players Category:FC La Chaux-de-Fonds players Category:FC Zürich players Category:Neuchâtel Xamax FCS players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Swiss Super League players
